flow.descriptionCdata:
752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.0448e584-6ade-4057-8dae-50c14d282798.prompt=Enter a value for coreIP 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.15021d9c-c625-40be-a4ca-4cb20aa4cda4.prompt=Enter a value for newUserPassword 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.1e482dbf-58ad-43e5-80a5-433ff62c8365.prompt=Enter a value for agent 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.21340979-3459-4449-a785-c835f8c12310.prompt=Enter a value for hostIPAddress 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.22161962-3a44-4853-a7be-846671eb19e8.description=
Checks to see if a string matches a specific rule.

Inputs\:
matchType - The type of match to perform.
toMatch - The string to check if matches another string.
matchTo - The string to match against.
ignoreCase - Boolean value for whether or not to ignore case during match.

Responses\:
success - The String matched.
failure - The string did not match, or something went wrong.
752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.227fd66a-fab0-4530-b35c-77f82ed31558.prompt=Enter a value for targetServerIP 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.267e2e59-20a6-4eb6-bceb-ce9f2a97c134.prompt=Enter a value for targetServerFQDN 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.63fc0250-1bd9-43c6-8313-1ab037ae1048.prompt=Enter a value for newUsername 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.6d6cdf26-a9a9-49cf-9f4d-5c342beb4a0d.description=Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null. 
Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - if the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - if some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.714425b1-0db4-4fa0-8aa0-e2000d3a664d.prompt=Enter a value for toMatch 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.749a8ec7-5160-414b-9dbe-a96035cf4cf1.description=
Checks to see if a string matches a specific rule.

Inputs\:
matchType - The type of match to perform.
toMatch - The string to check if matches another string.
matchTo - The string to match against.
ignoreCase - Boolean value for whether or not to ignore case during match.

Responses\:
success - The String matched.
failure - The string did not match, or something went wrong.
752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.82c73b3a-2c2f-466e-997d-17826731498b.description=It helps the user to search for the given SA entity (ex\: Server, Software Policy, Packages, etc) and returns the SA entity ids and names Inputs\: coreHost - The DNS name or IP Address of your SAS core. corePort - The port to Connect to your SAS core on. coreProtocol - The protocol to connect to your SAS core with. Either HTTP or HTTPS. coreUsername - The username for host. corePassword - The password for host. coreVersion - The version of SAS to use. type - Searchable type. it could be one of the com.opsware.search.SearchService.getSearchableTypes() filter - Searchable filter expression. (refer com.opsware.search.SearchService for details) Responses\: success - retrieved successfully failure - failed to retrieve data Returns\: id -entity id name -entity name 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.857f4fb8-0e1a-4f19-b98c-b2f45c8ee329.prompt=Enter a value for toMatch 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.869eea91-82b6-436f-b90b-c2f34aaacf13.prompt=Enter the SAS version used\: 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.8767e8f3-fdae-4864-9e6c-3c726cbea9c2.prompt=Enter a value for privateKeyFilePrefix 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.9b76942e-dc26-4d29-b75a-d1813b48abd1.description=
Checks to see if a string matches a specific rule.

Inputs\:
matchType - The type of match to perform.
toMatch - The string to check if matches another string.
matchTo - The string to match against.
ignoreCase - Boolean value for whether or not to ignore case during match.

Responses\:
success - The String matched.
failure - The string did not match, or something went wrong.
752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.a2f94a00-0e8a-413a-af0c-257ec538a06e.prompt=Enter a value for serverID 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.b9fc3052-d674-4d55-93cd-0c7ece944188.prompt=Enter a value for toMatch 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.fbc659e9-d009-478f-a21d-ca70cd30c304.prompt=Enter a value for targetServerIP 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.fc407e27-8fc4-4c9f-9f6d-f7410347514c.prompt=Enter a value for sudoUsername 752d040f-54ac-480b-bcb6-f31a6e4596fb.fd9d75e6-d780-4666-8de9-b2b325ebb4ab.description=Retrieves the server(s) ServerVO properties Inputs\: coreHost - The DNS name or IP Address of your SAS core. corePort - The port to Connect to your SAS core on. coreProtocol - The protocol to connect to your SAS core with. Either HTTP or HTTPS. coreUsername - The username for host. corePassword - The password for host. coreVersion - The version of SAS to use. agent - The agent name search string (can be a partial name and multiple return results can be returned; the matching type for this input can be selected by using the 'matching' flag). matching - A flag that indicates if the search performed using the agent name should be based on a partial or exact match. The default value for this input is 'Begins With'. serverID - The ID of the searched server. This input should be used for unique identification. If provided, then the 'agent' input is ignored. delimiter - The delimiter used to separate the result values. By default the values are comma delimited. Responses\: success - retrieved successfully failure - failed to retrieve data Returns\: createdBy - The name of the user who created this object. createdDate - The date that this object was created. id - The unique ID of this object. createdBy - The name of the user who created this object. createdDate - The date that this object was created. dirtyAttributes - A ; delimited list of attributes that are dirty (Modified and not yet fully propagated). modifiedBy - The user who last modified this object. modifiedDate - The date that this object was last modified on. description - The description of this object. hostname - The DNS hostname of this object. model - The model of this object. osVersion - The version of the OS running on the object. primaryIP - The primary IP address of this object. serialNumber - This object's serial number. manufacturer - The manufacturer of this object. name - The name of this object version - The version of this object codeset - The Code set of this object. customerName - The name of the customer this object was created for. defaultGW - The default gateway used when accessing this object. discoveredDate - The date when this object was first discovered. facilityName - The name of the facility housing this object. locale - The locale this object is in. lockComment - The comment on this object's locked. NOTE\: object may not be locked. lockDate - The date this object was last locked. lockUser - The user who locked this object last. isLocked - A boolean value specifying whether or not this object is currently locked. loopbackIP - The loopback ip address used by this object. managementIP - The management ip address used by this object. mid - mid The server's management identifier. NetBIOSName - The full netBIOS (Windows networking) name for this object. lifecycle - The state in the Opsware lifecycle that this object is currently in. origin - The origin of the managed server. ASSIMILATED or PROVISIONED osFlavor - The flavor of the OS running on this object. For example\: Windows. osSPVersion - The service pack version of the OS running on the object. peerIP - The managed server's peer IP address. platformName - The name of the platform. previousSWRegDate -The last time the Opsware agent reported the installed software on the server. realmName - The name of the realm this object is in. stage - The stage of the managed server. state - The current state of the managed server\: OK, UNREACHABLE or MAINTENANCE use - The intended use of the managed server (i.e. its role in a deployment)\: DEVELOPMENT, STAGING, PRODUCTION or UNKNOWN. virtualizationType - The virtualization type.
flow.name: Manage Server
